creator: FlamingTempura
title: Spark Inbox Monitor
description: This project creates a simple LED wheel that visually represents the number of emails in your inbox. The number of illuminated LEDs corresponds to the number of unread emails.
steps: Plug the Spark Core into the Internet Button.
Prepare the Spark Core following the instructions at http://docs.spark.io/connect/ and take note of the device name.
Using spark.io, copy the firmware code from https://github.com/FlamingTempura/spark-inbox/blob... into the editor and flash it to the Spark Core. Note the access token.
Install Node.js on your computer following the instructions at http://nodejs.org/
Rename config.example.json to config.json and edit the file with a text editor, inputting your token, device name, email username, and email password. Ensure IMAP is enabled for your email provider.
